## cilium nodeid list

List node IDs and the associated IP addresses

```
cilium nodeid list [flags]
```

### Options

```

  -o, --output string   json| yaml| jsonpath='{}'
```

      --config string   Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
